name: Jet Space: The Journey Begins
description:
Jet Space puts you in control of a space ship that is navigating through space and trying to collect oddly retro orbs. Guide your space ship with a simple one button control, but don't be fooled -- controlling your jets(!) wont be so easy.

This game was originally developed for mobile, but my friends were having fun testing the game on my Mac -- so here it is!

The Game:
- Your jet needs to collect all of the orbs without crashing.

The Controls:
- Left Click!

The Twist:
- It's not always easy flying straight when you're in space.
